commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
{%- if section.settings.heading != blank -%} <{{ section.settings.heading_tag }} style="color: {{ section.settings.heading_color }}; text-align: {{ section.settings.heading_align }}; font-weight: {{ section.settings.heading_weight }}"> {{ section.settings.heading }} {%- endif -%} {%- if section.settings.text != blank -%}
{{ section.settings.text }}
{%- endif -%} {%- if section.settings.product != blank -%} {% assign product = all_products[section.settings.product] %}

{{ product.title }}

{{ product.price | money }}

{% if section.settings.button_icon_position == 'left' and section.settings.button_icon != blank %}{% endif %} {{ section.settings.button_text }} {% if section.settings.button_icon_position == 'right' and section.settings.button_icon != blank %}{% endif %}
{%- endif -%}
{% schema %} { "name": "Featured Product Grid", "tag": "section", "class": "custom-section", "settings": [ { "type": "image_picker", "id": "bg_image", "label": "Background Image" }, { "type": "color", "id": "bg_color", "label": "Background Color", "default": "#ffffff" }, { "type": "text", "id": "custom_id", "label": "Custom ID" }, { "type": "text", "id": "custom_class", "label": "Custom CSS Class" }, { "type": "select", "id": "section_width", "label": "Section Width", "default": "standard", "options": [ { "value": "standard", "label": "50% Width" }, { "value": "full", "label": "Full Width" } ] }, { "type": "select", "id": "section_content_width", "label": "Content Width", "default": "standard", "options": [ { "value": "standard", "label": "50% Width" }, { "value": "full", "label": "Full Width" } ] }, { "type": "product", "id": "product", "label": "Select Product" }, { "type": "range", "id": "padding_top", "label": "Padding Top", "min": 0, "max": 100, "step": 1, "default": 0 }, { "type": "range", "id": "padding_bottom", "label": "Padding Bottom", "min": 0, "max": 100, "step": 1, "default": 0 }, { "type": "range", "id": "padding_left", "label": "Padding Left", "min": 0, "max": 100, "step": 1, "default": 0 }, { "type": "range", "id": "padding_right", "label": "Padding Right", "min": 0, "max": 100, "step": 1, "default": 0 }, { "type": "range", "id": "section_height_desktop", "label": "Height (Desktop)", "min": 100, "max": 1200, "step": 10, "default": 600 }, { "type": "checkbox", "id": "hide_desktop", "label": "Hide on Desktop", "default": false }, { "type": "checkbox", "id": "hide_tablet", "label": "Hide on Tablet", "default": false }, { "type": "checkbox", "id": "hide_mobile", "label": "Hide on Mobile", "default": false }, { "type": "text", "id": "heading", "label": "Heading Text" }, { "type": "select", "id": "heading_tag", "label": "Heading Tag", "default": "h2", "options": [ { "value": "h1", "label": "H1" }, { "value": "h2", "label": "H2" }, { "value": "h3", "label": "H3" }, { "value": "h4", "label": "H4" }, { "value": "h5", "label": "H5" }, { "value": "h6", "label": "H6" } ] }, { "type": "color", "id": "heading_color", "label": "Heading Color" }, { "type": "select", "id": "heading_align", "label": "Heading Alignment", "options": [ { "value": "left", "label": "Left" }, { "value": "center", "label": "Center" }, { "value": "right", "label": "Right" } ] }, { "type": "select", "id": "heading_weight", "label": "Heading Font Weight", "options": [ { "value": "normal", "label": "Normal" }, { "value": "bold", "label": "Bold" }, { "value": "lighter", "label": "Lighter" } ] }, { "type": "richtext", "id": "text", "label": "Text Body" }, { "type": "color", "id": "text_color", "label": "Text Color" }, { "type": "select", "id": "text_align", "label": "Text Alignment", "options": [ { "value": "left", "label": "Left" }, { "value": "center", "label": "Center" }, { "value": "right", "label": "Right" } ] }, { "type": "select", "id": "text_weight", "label": "Text Weight", "options": [ { "value": "normal", "label": "Normal" }, { "value": "bold", "label": "Bold" }, { "value": "lighter", "label": "Lighter" } ] }, { "type": "range", "id": "image_width", "label": "Image Width (%)", "min": 10, "max": 100, "step": 1, "default": 100 }, { "type": "select", "id": "image_ratio", "label": "Image Ratio", "options": [ { "value": "1 / 1", "label": "Square" }, { "value": "16 / 9", "label": "Landscape" }, { "value": "9 / 16", "label": "Portrait" } ] }, { "type": "checkbox", "id": "lazyload", "label": "Lazy Load Images", "default": true }, { "type": "select", "id": "image_hover", "label": "Image Hover Effect", "options": [ { "value": "none", "label": "None" }, { "value": "zoom", "label": "Zoom" }, { "value": "grayscale", "label": "Grayscale" }, { "value": "fade", "label": "Fade" } ] }, { "type": "text", "id": "button_text", "label": "Button Text" }, { "type": "url", "id": "button_link", "label": "Button Link" }, { "type": "select", "id": "button_style", "label": "Button Style", "options": [ { "value": "primary", "label": "Primary" }, { "value": "secondary", "label": "Secondary" } ] }, { "type": "text", "id": "button_icon", "label": "Button Icon (SVG or Font)" }, { "type": "select", "id": "button_icon_position", "label": "Icon Position", "options": [ { "value": "left", "label": "Left" }, { "value": "right", "label": "Right" } ] } ], "presets": [ { "name": "Featured Product Grid", "category": "Somos Custom" } ] } {% endschema %}
